value.title: StarCraft 2: Two Hero Banshees!
value.excerpt: HeRoMaRinE versus Reynor in a professional Zerg versus Terran in StarCraft 2. Big Gabe gets an advantage in the early game, but facing off against Reynor is not an easy task as he is known to defend with minimal defences and relentless counter attacks. value.title: StarCraft 2: VOID RAYS ARE... GOOD?! (DRG vs Cyan)
value.excerpt: Void Rays are making a comeback in professional StarCraft 2. In this match of Protoss versus Zerg I focus a lot on what Cyan is playing.
